nHgmEWZxL7oTgagGL4b3sA.text: I live this place. Great food, great service. Lunch time buffet is fast and cheap. Try the Guadalajara Special with a BIG beer. My kids love the variety on the kids menu and they always seem to be able to handle special orders without any problems.

ykRm5KxqQ-7HM-xe29yU1Q.text: Stopped by on a whim. Was visiting the area. Service was good and attentive. We had 2 different Quesadila. Food was fresh and good. Guacamole was fresh with just a bit of spice. Good experience and good portion size.

photos.caption: Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States

J3MtGX73_3l3afYAA_UloA.text: The buffet is reasonably priced, the food however...mediocre at best and it really is a gamble on the service. I've had a few servers that were top notch and a few that' ve never heard the phrase "customer service".   Honestly, don't waste your time or money.

g8TWj_xnB9e00byc8jSr-Q.text: big fan of the lunch buffet.  Although it tends to be the same things most of the time there are 4 bins that rotate what is offered.  the kid always enjoys cheese quesadilla and tater tots.  i enjoy making my soft tacos with the spicey steak.

8kQ8ebHwA8cVSY9DsZ39PA.text: Fast service, good food.  We've been coming here for years and have had easy going experiences nearly every time.

87MSbCfJDH_r8qcVRbufjQ.text: Worst service ever! Ordered 2 enchiladas over the phone to pick up. Got there handed my card...after I signed I thought about it and realized my order was two enchilada dinners. I asked her to refund it and charge me for what I ordered. She rung it up again for the cost. I ended up paying like 30 dollars for 9 dollars worth of food!!!! Then she was like give me back the food!!! What!?!? I live 5 minutes away and drive to Miguel's. Better food better service.

zXrkBqzV0ilgC84HuEyDvQ.text: When I lived in Charlotte this location was a  frequent stop for me. The food is fresh and delicious and the portions are extremely generous. The service is sketchy sometimes but overall this is a great place to get some quality Mexican food. Check them out!

QnRUAXPBock7L1C9DtI18g.text: Went there tonight with my husband, daughter, and niece.  When we arrived we were promptly seated.  It then took approximately 10 minutes for someone to drop off salsa, and another 5-8 for another server to greet us to get our drinks. After we ordered drinks, it took another 10 minutes to place our order even though our menus were gathered and folded on the table (sure sign to anyone that we were ready to order). I ordered for the girls, 2 quesadilla kids meals, and a taco salad for myself.  My husband  ordered apetizers for us (chicken wings, and guacamolel) and Carne asada as a main course. We specified that the kids food should come first, even before the apetizers.  Well... the kids meals came first, then came my order, then my husbands order...lastly came you guessed it the apetizers. The kids hated their quesadilla said it tasted funny (mozzarella cheese?) Needless to say the other entrees an apetizers followed suite.  It was so ... bland.  I am pregnant and hospital food tastes better than this. Got the check to find out that the kids meal does not include a drink even though I asked the server if I could get orange juice with their meal (he agreed). 2 bucks per drink for some imitation non refillable oj had me at my wits end.  I just told my husband deduct it from his tip. He laughed and said we should have went to chick FIL a.  If you ever get the feeling of going to this restaurant dont.  Take my husbands advice...just go somewhere else.

nWsMYYCfS8oC6V4AuoLVXQ.text: Place is pretty spacious and typical Mexican cuisine. I didn't really care for much, seems more lack of seasoning than anything. Service was fair. Only 2 other tables and the server couldn't keep up.

bBS0KlSsm7I1QUVLn0I6dA.text: I've been to this restaurant many time through the years. Because it's close, easy and not terrible food. But Sunday was more disrespect than I can take. We ordered our drinks and food, no issue. After waiting 40 mins,which is crazy for this place, we get 2 of our 4 orders. Wait another 10 minutes we get the third order. She finally ask me my order as she is dropping this entree off. Telling me it was coming she has to go pick it up. Ok. Another 5 minutes passes my family is finished with their plates, she picks their plates up and apologize again. I tell her it's alright, just put it in a box I'll eat it at home we are ready for the check. She returns with the bill still no food and we notice they charged us full price for their mistake. I ask her if some compensation can be made, she replies "no, is you want the food you have to pay for it" to that I said "no worries." Great customer service guy! I'll drive a few extra minutes if it means I can actually have the food I order. Will not be back to see you anytime soon.

PZavt4ekXl8J1w4BLGKNkA.text: the lunch buffet is the only value from this restaurant..the service is horrible if you go at night or not during lunch buffet times depending on which server you get. there are two servers that are nice and attentive and wonderful...the rest..eh...... food is good on buffet, always something different....great salad bar and i LOVE their pico di gallo?? i dont think i spelled that right so sorry!!! no judgement!! lol

Zk_K_MWbQRC7XZ_tutVkbA.text: Buffet is amazing! I also come for dinner quite often and the service is pretty good! Chips, cheese, and salsa are delicious. Not overpriced for the good amount of food you get!

4a2qsEk5eMB6yknI-XDTNg.text: While deciding what to make for dinner, decided to go here for my first time. Wow! I got the steak super burrito, and it was super delicious.  Food tasted clean and fresh. Top of the burrito had a white, thick, cheese sauce glazed on it, which made the meal even better. I loved this place!  Great quality food, good customer service, and not to mention really cool fluorescent lighting.

i2JvkdVEF0bRbQOhK5jgxg.text: This place was worth the visit. The food was good, the prices were great and the staff were attentive. All in all worth trying out if your in the area.

FjP6jphOpoRi4dnO-bsyHg.text: Our service and food were great. Everyone on the staff tried to make it an experience and not just a dinner! Fajitas and carne asada tacos were delectable!

photos.caption: Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States

M9YRhxar5mzqd5-A5DRVaw.text: Quite pleased. We had been going often a couple years ago but the food kept getting worse as did the service.  By things have changed. The wait staff was very attentive without being annoying and the food was both ample and very good. We eat out often and when we find the right combination we select one or two local Restarunt's to frequent. I think we are back here if things stay the same for our Mexican food cr

D-3hxSOpyl0E0eAB4Tcmzg.text: Ugh. Just, ugh...  Take out: bottom of all tortillas wet. Tacos fell apart trying to pick them up. Quesadillas were a thick soup. Really?  I am not a cook, and I could do way better!

HUneAIARCBky216IFberMw.text: Service here is extremely poor. You have to wait 5 minutes for refills on your drinks and they will try to bring you only one thing of chips and 1 salsa for four people and avoid filling it back up before your food gets to your table.

C9sFNuSGT47R4IQjO5CjtQ.text: Very greasy every time I go. Last time I went I ordered the chicken soup which was actually quite good however that's probably the only thing on the menu I can tolerate without feeling ill afterwards. Very Disappointing.

Xn6xgJ_0A0c931ASnAXnHg.text: The restaurant is beautiful, the service is ok. However, the vegeterian options are very limited and the food is extremely salty.

Z1U2z_IXJqqaCpBF7mMuEg.text: I like going here for dinner & taking the night off of cooking.  They do good Tex-mex style plates.  The restaurant over over-lit  (too bright and uninviting) so we sit at the bar.  Service has been okay,  sometimes you gotta just hollar when ya need something,  and that's just another perk of eating at the bar.

cGCL6it4QsyWmvCbL4v65A.text: Stupid waitress with a manly laugh took ages to serve us even though we were the only people there.  Plenty of time to laugh it up with her boyfriend at the bar though.

Rz-Pl1Dfj6wTdAxbQX7gvw.text: I am always leery when an authentic Mexican restaurant uses ground beef!!?? for those of you who think this is Authentic Mexican food.. I feel so sorry for your taste buds.

ldXgW5PuylilsNOfysm9PA.text: Let me first say that who ever gave it 1 star doesn't know Mexican food. I guess they have never been outside of Charlotte Before!  The food was priced very well. It was cheep and tasted very good. We started off the night with a Margarita which was good. Got Guacamole that was tasty as well. You cant go wrong with a 2.50 guac dish. As for as our main dishes it was great!! I think this place is very good.   I have yet to be there for the Lunch or Lunch Buffet, the dinner was great. The plates were huge and tasted wonderful. If you think that "South of the Border" is good Mexican then A) you don't know good Food B) this place will blow that crap out of the water!!  In the area you can not beat this place for food and for the price. it is a must go to place here in this part of Charlotte. If you think you want to have a good night with some friends and your thinking Bull and Barrister, I strongly recommend this place!

photos.caption: Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States

IHDk-p1KtNwLcvhTI0y7Ww.text: Just endured the worst eating experience we have had in years.  Guadalajara Especial was far from what was described.  Mostly a huge pile of stale lettuce floating atop of sea of greasy and essentially  tasteless soupy gray ground beef.  The tamale was  completely saltless but very peppery shredded meat of indeterminate species sitting atop a generous pile of ever so sticky and tasteless masa.   The taquitos were burned but running with liquid grease.  The salsa was really just canned tomato sauce without the usual seasonings including salt but with a dash of vinegar.  The only thing that could make this meal worse would have been table full of loud foul mouthed aging juvenile delinquents discussing with pride their DUI achievements along with petty crimes and best techniques for lying to law enforcement along with vivid graphic descriptions of the contents of diapers and the method of expressing canine anal glands.  These conversations were provided by several young men wearing blue Horne Heating and Air Conditioning tee shirts and tolerated with no attempt at control by management.  Just aweful.

Km0ELiQqCluCdGq6poZHSw.text: So, i went today for the lunch buffet and unfortunately, i've got to take away a star. The beef just wasn't good today. Tasted almost uncooked, but still in a grease tub. Also the rice was pretty blah too. The rest of the stuff was good enough for a cheap Mexican buffet (beans, cheese, lettuce, shells).  Overall, i still think it's worth 6 bucks.      The service was top notch, even for a buffet, the server was like a mind reader. Constantly topping my drink off when low. i thought to myself, i need a napkin and sure as shit, there he was with napkins...before i asked.

K92-YNk6x16Z_WM85yLOFw.text: I have yet to be impressed with the food here, but will keep trying. It just seems like a bland plate that neither warms the heart nor makes an impact.  Honestly, I probably don't know what I'm talking about because I know a lot of folks who like it here. Right now? It's not for me.

wf3ZKK_tesWj2NzVJ4dEEg.text: Ive came twice after church on Sundays and enjoy the buffet for the price. The food is seasoned well and I enjoy being able to make different items from the budget like burritos, taco salads, and fajitas. Their shrimp fajitas was good, I sad that when I went back it wasn't offered on the buffet. I will def be back again and again!

OzXn59Xn1WYT876lUqO2ew.text: I feel bad, this will be my first "one star" rating for any business. I so wanted to like this place since it is the closest Mexican restaurant to my house. I have been here about three times before I started Yelping and each time the food quality seemed to get worse....   First, this is your typical strip mall chain Mexi joint. They come to your table quick with water and chips (that was the only bright spot). The salsa came and it tasted and looked like watered down ketchup with a fleck or two of pepper seeds in it to give it the appearance of salsa - must have came from a large drum of pre-over-processed salsa rejects. My idea of salsa is fresh tomatoes, onions, cilantro, jalapenos, etc where I can see and know what I am eating. THIS CRAP WAS GROSS!   My food arrived - I think we all have ordered the "3 enchiladas" plate from any of our Mexican favorites. Mine was covered, well avalanched with ice burg lettuce, cold runny sour cream and unmelted cheese. I wanted to ask for a small shovel to find my 3 enchiladas covered up on the bottom. Anyway, i got to them and the chicken was ice cold and gross, one bite - done with that one....I thought, hmmm, melted cheese enchilada....wrong - cut into that and all the cheese was still unmelted - WTF! The beef enchilada was ok and it warranted two bites, but had no flavor.   Trying to keep this short - but overall, food SUCKED and I will not go back even on someone else's dime!   see my pics from this trip....

photos.caption: Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. the crap that was my dinner
Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. chips - average
Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. salsa that is actually ketchup watered down

X41MKnuffs_gFUlhlrgRCQ.text: My husband suggested this place .... we were to meet for dinner,  I made it there 1st and was very disappointed in cleanliness, this place is dirty, from the nasty carpets to the seats. After sitting there for about 5min, I got up and walked out, called my husband to meet at another restaurant in the area. I will never return.

uLsGaI34_irUHPW2aU6ydw.text: Everything on their menu is sooo good! My favorite Mexican restaurant. It's like that special hole in the wall authentic food you always hope you find.

5LNOFYhUvfKhb3JtZa8xUA.text: Excellent service, generous portions both food and drinks.  Nice to sit on the patio.  We are regulars.  A great value and a fun neighborhood Mexican restaurant.  Highly recommend Los Arcos especially for families.

k33f-ZiAyzLdwGQ6HlwUWw.text: Great choice for Mexican and good service! Drinks were on point.. Carne Asada had a nice flavor

photos.caption: Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States

NyITlK-ha8jwWfqO5jH33A.text: The service sucks. The server didnt even say thank you. We tipped anyway because thats what we are supposed to do after we get service but it felt like we were doing her a favor by being her costumer.

npg2nzYI3HjROzDREQVnRg.text: My favorite of the Mexican restaurants around here. Pollo Loco is my favorite and it's even awesome as leftovers! Drinks are fair priced. My waiter was awesome too. Middle aged man on a Friday night, sorry i couldn't have got his name to give him better props :(

ZhFHkAO7NEdLPRszGqYfkA.text: Second time going to Los Arcos. It's a must stop when I'm visiting my parents in Charlotte. Very reasonably priced, excellent food and the lunch buffet is a no brainer!

fXHsmg_XgogQNJZXBm8BjQ.text: I'm forced to give this place a star rating but I can't even give this restaurant any stars in my book!It seems they have s hard time to understand what a Bean and cheese burrito is and the real understanding of what Mexican food truly is!  What they serve is Tex-Mex not Mexican Food like they advertise themselves as!! I went in tonight to buy a bean and cheese burrito and it costed me almost $5 for something that really should of only costed $1.50 at most!  And on top of it it took them almost 15 minutes to make this gross mess!  I will definitely not be referring anyone to eat here!  I can make Mexican food 200% better than anyone here!

photos.caption: Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. Upsetting mess!

40Z7gUROJBlAi-vMdrUK1g.text: This place is great! We stopped in on the way home from a long day at the whitewater center looking for a good margarita and some tasty food. This place didn't disappoint! Everyone who works there is so welcoming and the food was awesome! Make sure to get a margarita too! ;)

U37AnWKCuz4GyQ_qc8Gw9w.text: Went there for Cinco de mayo and the wait for food was over and the hour air conditioning was broke it was very hot. My wife's food came out without tortillas or the sides to build the fajitas. Had to send the chicken back to warm again by the time the rest came out. Overall very bad experience probably not ever visiting again.

0TBVXFHR_X7YSJtoNAoqyQ.text: I came into make a to go order as I entered I noticed a customer sending their food back,as I stood there the waiter that took the food back to the kitchen stood in the back and without washing his hands picked out all the onions from this customers plate a hole plate later the waiter hands this customers plate to the cook he puts hot cheese over the mess of food and sends it back to the waiter to give back to the customer thankfully the customer noticed something wasn't right and sent it back at that point the waiter put the plate of food in the trash and made a new one,I walked over and made sure the customer knew what happend. I pray everyone stays away from this place and it gets shut down. What happento this customer should never happen.

uvWRe58he7RgH0V6Dc9tZg.text: So...do they assume you want the buffet? We were given no menus. Communication could have used a lil work. Food was alright. We were only charged for one adult buffet when it was two of us so I threw in another star. I'm sad this isn't very far from where we live but we probably won't be back.

Dek-f1gLo9Fa73uERsBl_A.text: Service was good, food was good. I love the build your own taco buffet. They have just about every topping you would want and a lot of different meats! Even fried fish.  I really enjoyed it.

z3AO-zkNHn2j9RWVC1cbKQ.text: Stopped by and had the lunch buffet and was thoroughly satisfied. Just enough options. The wings were great! My friend and I were seated promptly. I don't remember the servers name but she was very polite and attentive. I will return!

9K_huM3l8Rx9RI8xMlSTbQ.text: Tons of food. Especially mexican food. This place is close to my parent's house and well, this is probably the place to go to when we're craving for some mexican food. Because it's 1. Extremely close, for those eat and sleep situations and 2. The food is good (and the beer is pretty cheap), and lastly 3. The portions on the plates are absolutely huge and plentiful.  I don't understand why they have a low rating on the restaurant, as this is the place I would go to for a quick mexican food fix. I mean I have to say this isn't the place to get a nice gourmet mexican food. It's a place where you go get down and dirty with some mexican food and if you choose to drink, they have a bar and you can lounge.   Overall, I think this place is wonderful. I get my fix for mexican food and well, I come out full. I'll definitely come back to this place when I'm craving for it.

photos.caption: Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. Super Burrito

WBjJ5BSdzhF_v9e22JFobA.text: We went for dinner on a Sunday night. The service was fast and our meal came quickly. The portions were large and the carne asada was very good but the arroz con pollo wasn't the best dish and the salsa could have used some added flavor.

DFv55sk3pU0tvVAdyTMCCA.text: The food is always delish! The service usually pretty good but I always seem to run out of water when we're here. Even with today being cinco de mayo they have done a good job at being timely. They also offered the lunch buffet at dinner for the holiday!

oRWdlCwpVqN2p4_gxNtggQ.text: I can say for my first time visiting here, it was pretty bad, my mother, younger brother and myself were visiting family and we were out of state, so when we all came here, I had no expectations for this place. Our first problem was that the hostess who was going to seat us, didn't seem to know how to seat us properly as she was trying to pull apart tables that she didn't need to pull apart, when there was a table already put together and ready to seat us at. The next problem was that my drink, which was a simple sprite, tasted awful and had no Carbonation at all so I had to switch to a coca cola instead, which after my first refill of coke, the second one had no carbonation either. When we were ordering, the server didn't seem to understand what were we're saying while we were ordering, we finally decided to use google translate to get our order placed. When the order finally got placed and we were given our food, multiple things were wrong with the order, things were missing while other things didn't come until asking several times for the missing items. Eventually after getting everything, we asked for a manager multiple times and finally had to walk up front to get one and talk to them. Must say, this will probably be the first and last time my family and I will be eating here.

Zr5k5pNX-Mo-kfbndg04KQ.text: Great food, great service. They've stepped up their game and they deserve their ranking to go up!!

WAG23Xprh7q3WM1sJK_Kfg.text: I've never had a problem at this location. The buffet is pretty good. The manager has always been very friendly.   I grew up in Cali and know what real a 5 star Mexican restaurant is, so on that note-  3 stars for the food 5 stars for the service

cb0iV6ysYNbtwzmQCSD66w.text: The lunch buffet is the best part!  The food is pretty good and the beers are cold.  The service, not so much.

jIkbJDF4r8E5R7zPAbHVLQ.text: The food is absolutely great BT the service kindve sucked... Our waitress brought chicken and shrimp instead of steak and shrimp.when asked to bring the proper thing the waitress became noticably upset she stated she has to ask the manager and when she returned she said "give it to me" and snatched the plate tho lol at which time I no longer want nothing

ENEIlpTNAN7wdOPpUzqIvQ.text: I appreciate having Mexican food at my fingertips. I'm not sure about the dine-in service but we frequently call orders in for pick up.  The pick up service is quick.  (About 15 min) You get a big bag of chips with salsa as well. I love their shredded chicken taco salad, which is what I order every time.   Overall it's good enough to satisfy a quick Mexican food craving.  It's not the best I ever had but it's decent for a Mexican food fix.  The salsa containers could be much bigger for to go orders.

pxFWYOdQA95ujvTWkGURZQ.text: Well... The water was good... Very bland food. Weird tasting chicken. And honestly margaritas that taste like pure tasteless syrup. Very odd...

wQaiVYH21ERsZSNJ5pZp9A.text: I had the fish taco for lunch and it is totally tasteless. Where in Mexico do they eat fish tacos with thousand island dressing? This is a low budget resturant that offers an all you can eat buffet for lunch which I did not try but seems to attract the locals. If you care about the taste of food then I would recommend to stay away.

photos.caption: Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. Fish taco served with thousand island dressing (to give it some taste obviously since it is tasteless.)

K8ILCVguB7SIjfCg-cckMg.text: Los Arcos was exactly what I thought it would be after I sat down.  Really really OK. The service wasn't bad, staff is friendly and they are quick to take your order as well as refill water and tea.  When I walked in I was promptly greeted and brought to a table, no menu yet (I'm guessing it's because some people chose the buffet, I did not) While waiting they brought me water because they had no soda for the syrups and they also offered me tea. As I am looking through the menu I notice a fly and then another and then another and then, we'll you get the point.  I didn't think much of it because it was a little warm and there is a buffet, not to say you'd want flies in your food there either but I was finally ready to order.   When I got my food it came correctly and with a fruit fly in the sour cream.  I told my server thigh I wasn't planing on eating the sour cream any way.  I ate the rest of the food, no flies I could see and it was no where near as good as I hoped it would be.  Overall rating out of 5 stars I give them a 3 Food 2 stars Staff 4 stars Cleanliness 1 star  They left a lot to be wanting but there's potential and it was busy so maybe my taste buds just didn't like fly.

photos.caption: Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. Booth

KxN31FBnwEu4oUtMzotFuQ.text: The food is average. Only one vegetarian option, but that is not why they are getting the coveted two star award. Our waiter, an athletic build waiter was the rudest human I have met in years. He was clipped when ordering, took extra long in every single session of the service, and seemed like we were bothering him to sit on outside porch.  He could really use some people skills, as we normally always tip well, but he got an ultra generous tip of 1 buck. I don't think I have ever tipped this low. I would go back if he was working in the kitchen or at another location.

ed8Ijx0Y-jJhawdJylDpjQ.text: Disgusting, not authentic!! I asked if the enchiladas came with red enchilada sauce and I was told they did and I asked if the cheese inside the cheese enchilada was real cheese or that disgusting white "cheese" sauce a d was told it was grated cheese inside so I ordered a tamale/ cheese enchiladas combo.  The order came to me without red sauce, but rather buried in the nasty, melted, white velveeta crap.   I ordered a burrito/taco combo for one of my sons and the waitress asked if he wanted hard or soft shell. I said soft. His "burrito" was served buried in a red sauce that tasted like spaghetti sauce and came with a hard-shell taco.  My other son ordered 2 chicken and cheese enchiladas. He asked if he could just have cheese and chicken only inside the enchiladas.  Well, these came without any cheese and inside was chicken and huge chunks of green chilis. And of course smotheredin their disgusting version of white "cheese" gunk.  Will not be returning ever!!

bWm4OBZA-QIRFqhUnwexgg.text: I had a very good experience here for lunch. They have a great selection of food on the buffet. Everything tasted fresh and delicious.

qEUuUTQPq1u53m8vyoc1fw.text: Got to go with the other poor reviews on this one.  What in the sloppy-wilted lettuce fajita salad is going on here!?  Decided to stop in just because. Uh maybe it's what I ordered? Maybe not?  Fajita salad is a total no . Big fat no   Like the lettuce was barely there and smothered with wet hit sauteed peppers. Just wet..  yucko. Lol.  Yikes.  Chicken was flavorless and service tried to be friendly but didnt seem like enough people working   Uhhhh no thanks! I'll pass next time...

photos.caption: Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. Slava from a jar I&#39;m guessing. Chips were stale.
Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. The bottom of a wet fajita salad.  Yes I actually ate it because I was starving!!!!

Ju7dgnu-vYEo1Wx22qPoqg.text: We went for taco night but apparently taco night is Monday night there. Our server was horrible  he didn't ask my husband if he wanted soft or hard tacos. He doenst eat hard tacos. So his tacos came out hard and we asked to send them back to get remade and the server couldn't take them back he said he would need to get a manager to come get them since it's a mess up. But I worked in the restaurant business before he could of taken them back to the kitchen.  So as we are waiting for the tacos my husband orders another margarita and he never received it. The server said the kitchen is backed up tonight but it couldn't have been there were 5 tables in there lol.  The food was really good and the drinks but the service was horrible don't know if we will go back ever again maybe for the food but pray we have better service.

uvVYLpH8RPWzLT8H8kFeiQ.text: Very good Mexican food served  in a clean and inviting restaurant, with average prices and good sized portions. We enjoyed the lunch faghitas, they were very good and served hot and fresh. This place was very busy during the lunch hour with many locals. The restaurant also offers a lunch buffet that looked really tempting for 7.99$.

bjyiX8tppNsSs8tONClOCw.text: Service is always awful  The food is sub par but they slop everything on a plate and don't even have the love for there food to at least plate it so it looks appetizing  They probably only stay in business because there is no other Latin food anywhere around the area and the native Carolinians probably think this food is good but since I've lived in San Diego next to the border of Mexico I know what real Mexican food is and this is not also living in south Florida I know what real Latin food is and this place doesn't hold a candle to any kind of Spanish food I've ever had!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. Hot mess of a plate
Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. Empty
Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. Here&#39;s are server

BjWf-nJFWptQjx24_L9hpA.text: Waitresses and waiters always good but this last trip the food was just disgusting. Tasteless! Garbage. Normally I don't complain and just eat it but the was truly inedible crap. The waiter said I ll speak to the manager. Manager said ok I'll give you 50% off this one if the 3 plates your table ordered.   Ok, normally I come 10-20 times a year with a typical bill of $50. I got $6 bucks back from the lousy dinner and will just make the 10 extra minute drive to south of the border. I ain't coming back.

LyYVX1wS5PmAF2PHet14Iw.text: If I could give this place 0 stars I would. Boyfriend and I made the unfortunate decision to pick this place for dinner tonight (spoiler alert, it's awful).   I ordered enchiladas, boyfriend ordered supreme burrito. My enchiladas were hot on the outside, ice cold and watery on the inside (frozen & re-heated, perhaps?). The real kicker is when the boyfriend found a curly hair on top of his burrito; when we pointed it out to the (very rude) waitress, she asked if it was "under or on top of the melted cheese".... as if it makes a difference? Is she insinuating that we placed the hair on top ourselves? Super odd and kind of a dumb question. She did, although hesitantly and with an exaggerated eye-roll, replace the burrito with a new order. Never received replacement silverware for his new order, either.  But, hey, if you like loud restaurants where other patrons are openly discussing testicle problems in grotesque detail (YES, testicles...I can't make this up), bratty kids running around, and incompetent wait staff, this might be just for you!

7DBniVVci6yx76IdocdY-w.text: I'm very disappointed to have to give this restaurant a one when only a year and a half ago I gave it a five. My husbands food came out first and he was half way done with his meal when my meal finally came out. I ordered shrimp quesadillas and the veggies were raw which was disgusting. To top it off there were flys in the restaurant and one landed on my plate and got stuck in the cheese. I WAS DONE at that point and I won't be going back here again. NASTY NASTY NASTY!

sUXYTPhKCQJDcqStBRXlMw.text: Excellent customer service here. I'm a frequent regular. The manager there is phenomenal, and she always takes excellent care of me! The food is amazing, and reasonably priced. I usually come here on my lunch break. This is the first time I've ever seen a Mexican Buffett! It's super popular in the area and they're ALWAYS packed for lunch. Their tacos taste super authentic and the buffet is a great option too for lunch! Make sure you check them out on Monday nights for dollar taco night!

6PYq819lWgPuchUClZVurQ.text: Didn't even waste my money here because we walked in and no one even cared to acknowledge us.  We stood at the front for almost 5 minutes with the staff just staring at us. My husband had to call one of the staff people over before we were even given menus.  I just looked at the menu and walked out.  I'm not spending money where it doesn't look like they value their customers.

VohRbykiequHkBVypY4nmw.text: Good authentic Mexican restaurant. Simple and standard menu. Lots of options. Very quick and courteous service.

voZDzjKEjRqSY6G2YdGDew.text: I wouldn't recommend this place if you're looking for decent Mexican food. The only thing that I enjoyed during the meal was the queso dip. The food portions were generous but was bland and was comprised of fatty meats that hadn't been trimmed and/or were dry. The margaritas were not what you expected; it tasted like lime koolaid with little to no alcohol in it. First time and last time.

Bjn7VBwkiRYumzer4kC1vA.text: Great place!  Took a gamble and we were very happy with the results.  Low key, game was on and the food was fresh and perfect.  We will certainly be back.

photos.caption: Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States

KG43g4rZHp-J9fv67K4BJQ.text: Garbage "Mexican" food. Dirty(very dirty) restaurant. Terrible atmosphere with insanely bright lighting. I was here once about 5 years ago and my experience was the same. Our  server was actually very polite, professional, and funny. Hes the only reason Im being generous w 2 stars.

yo2lW5t2ga2-NXd-69N-dQ.text: Authentic Mexican food with super large portions. Most entrees are large enough to share. The servers are really attentive and the kitchen always accommodates special request. I just wish the interior was more appealing. It isn't dirty, just unkept.

8GStGvYjMKKVNpHH4dHfgQ.text: I've been eating at this chain for years! I fluent this location more than the others.  The food is fantastic. The salsa is perfect. To the yelpers who rate this place low I say try some of the places all around the states! This place always has good service, great food with huge portions. Their RICE and CHIPS  are some of the best I have experienced! !!! When visiting this restaurant,  they never disappoint!

photos.caption: Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. Steak and shrimp fajitas
Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. Rice and beans
Photo of Los Arcos Mexican Restaurant - Charlotte, NC, United States. Chilaqueles

y5-QyMoZtWFBc26fx5tb3g.text: We are new to this area of town and were checking out the restaurant options. We ran across Los Arcos and decided to give it a try. We didn't do the buffet because they rarely offer the things we like. So glad we gave this place a chance! The service was great, food was great, very fresh! The restaurant was very clean, and no screaming children lol...that's one of my pet peeves about eating out, although I know that isn't the restaurant's fault. We will definitely be back! Oh, I forgot to mention the delicious Margarita, also :-)
